title: As an AMT User, I want to sign into the Academy Management Tool
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user navigate to https://ebisamtdev.mlb.com/login 
AND user is entering a valid username and password
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Login"
custom_expected:
THEN The system will verify the user's credentials, and assuming they are valid, will log the user into the site and take them to the homepage. 
AND If the credentials are not valid, the user will be given the error displayed in the provided wires.



Wire:
https://zpl.io/bznOjQ7
https://zpl.io/Vqw4kBJ
https://zpl.io/aMvxjZJ

title: As an AMT User, I want to sign out of the system
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged into ATM 
AND user is navigate to the "Sign Out" link at the top right conner of the page 
AND if user viewing the page in Spanish this says "Terminar Sesiόn"
custom_steps:
WHEN clicking "Sign Out" 
OR  clicking "Terminar Sesiόn"
custom_expected:
THEN the system will log the user out of AMT
AND take them back to the login page.

Wire: 
https://zpl.io/agNyqxZ
https://zpl.io/adkQ1Ql

title: As an AMT User, I want to View a Prospect Profile Page
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user is viewing the Prospects page
custom_steps: WHEN user click on a Prospect's Name
custom_expected:
THEN the system will load the Prospects Profile
AND browser tab text should say "Profile - [Last Name], [First Name]"
AND the profile will match the provided data discovery and wire
AND this story is meant to cover the building of the profile page and includes the header, individual sections to follow

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

https://zpl.io/29ygDKW
https://zpl.io/adkDMd7

title: As an AMT User, I want to choose whether to view the homepage in English or Spanish
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user login to AMT 
AND user navigate to an ""English" and "Español" hyperlink at the top of the page
AND the language currently being used is greyed out and not clickable
custom_steps:
WHEN user viewing the site in English, clicking on "Español" 
AND user viewing the site in Spanish, clicking on "English"
custom_expected:
THEN system will reload the page in Spanish. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. (1)
AND system will reload the page in English. The system will need to maintain this selection as the user navigates from tab to tab and form to form. (2)

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospects+Page

Wire: 
https://zpl.io/bJvdglr
https://zpl.io/adkQ1Ql

title: As a Club AMT User, I want to view players currently checked into my academy
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks  "Prospects" link on the top nav
custom_expected:
THEN the Prospects Page will feature a table of players
AND the table will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND the dashboard is first loaded, the table will default to the status filter being set to "Checked In"
AND If the user changes the status filter, clicking the "Checked In" filter will reload the table to show all players with a status of Checked In
AND If no players have a status of Checked In, the table will be blank

title: As an AMT User, I want to View a Prospect's Check In History
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in 
AND user is on the prospects profile page
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing the profile page
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a Check In History section on the prospects' profile
AND this section will display a summary of all the players check ins
AND Club Users will only see Check Ins created by their org
BUT BOC Users will see all Check In information
AND The section will match the provided data discovery and wire
AND The section will NOT be editable in edit mode (edit mode covered in a later story)
AND this section will include a thumbnails of the picture association with each check in, as depicted
AND when viewing the page in Spanish, field labels will display the provided spanish translations
AND if the Prospect has no check in history, this section will be blank
 
UI AC:
- Tables globally should be responsive (horizontal scrollbar to see overflow) down to screen size 768. At 767 switch to the mobile display for tables. (Accordion sections)

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

Wireframes:
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW
https://zpl.io/adkDMd7

custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC user is login 
AND user is viewing an existing prospect's profile

custom_expected:
THEN the system will reload the form in edit mode
AND a Save (grey) button will appear in place of the Edit button (no edit button displayed in edit mode).
AND editable fields will match what is in the provided Data Discovery (Note the special behaviors)
AND an Edit (grey) button will be available anytime the form is in view mode for BOC Users.
AND Club Users may not edit an existing prospect's profile

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate players' Months From Signing so I can easily tell what check in rules apply
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in 
AND user is on the prospects Dashboard
custom_steps:
WHEN user view the Months From Signing date field on the Dashboard 
AND on the prospect profiles
custom_expected:
THEN Months From Signing field will be populated on the Prospects Dashboard
AND Months From Signing will be populated on prospect profiles
AND Months From Signing will be calculated based off the prospects Eligible to Sign Date (located on his profile)
AND If the current date is past the player's Eligible to Sign Date, "Eligible to Sign" will be displayed*
OR If the current date is between 0 and 6 months prior to the player's Eligible to Sign Date, "0 - 6 Months" will be displayed*
OR If the current date is between 6 and 12 months prior to the player's Eligible to Sign Date, "6 - 12 Months" will be displayed*
OR If the current date is between 12 and 18 months prior to the player's Eligible to Sign Date, "12 - 18 Months" will be displayed*

*Note:  Data discoveries will have more specific information on how this data will be displayed on individual screens.


Wires:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

Calculating Eligible to Sign Date:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Calculating+Eligible+to+Sign+Date

title: As an AMT User, I want to create a new profile
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club and BOC user is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "New Prospect" in the top nav
custom_expected:
THEN the system will load the New Prospect dashboard
AND the dashboard will feature a "Create New" widget
AND the widget and dashboard will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND the Next button is disabled until all required fields have been filled out
AND clicking Next will load a blank profile in edit mode
AND the profile will match the provided wire and data discovery
AND the header loads with the players name and a status of Draft
AND the Check In History and Travel Authorization form sections will not be visible
AND the profile image shows a default image
AND the checkin button is disabled

- The fields responsive classes will be the same as on the profile

https://zpl.io/a7JdAvR
https://zpl.io/bPv7pjL

https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=EBIS&title=Prospect+Profile

title: As an AMT User, I want a new suspect profile created in ebis when I create a new profile in AMT
custom_preconds:
Given a club or boc user is logged in 
AND user is creating new profile in AMT
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks Save on a new profile
custom_expected:
THEN matching profile will be created in ebis
AND the ebis profile will be created as a International Suspect profile
AND The information appearing on the Intl Suspect profile will match the information entered on for the profile in AMT
AND The two profiles will both have the same ebisID
AND All normal ebis permissions, rules, visibility, etc. will still apply and the profile will be treated as if it were created through ebis

https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+Player+Profile+-+Data+Discovery

title: As an AMT User, I want to Quick Search Prospects
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user is on Prospects Page
custom_steps: WHEN user navigate to the quick search bar
custom_expected:
THEN there will be a quick search bar as depicted in the provided wire
AND the quick search will be a Select2 Autocomplete
AND When the user begins typing a blue x icon will appear at the right side of the input.

title: As a User, I want to see if a Prospect is Registered or not when I look at his profile in AMT
custom_steps:
Wire:
Desktop/Tablet Landscape: https://zpl.io/29ygDKW
900-768: https://zpl.io/aXk3YLK
Mobile: https://zpl.io/adkDMd7

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

AC:
 - In the summary info section of the player's profile, there will be a 'L1 Reg' field
 - If the prospect has a date in the L1 Reg field of their ebis profile, this field will be set to 'Yes'
 - If the prospect has anything other than a date in the L1 Reg field of their ebis profile, this field will be set to 'No'
 - If the player becomes verified in ebis, this field will update
 - If the player is merged in ebis, this field will update
 - The layout of the summary fields at this resolution https://zpl.io/aXk3YLK will change slightly to accommodate more fields.

title: As an AMT User, I want a new "Age-Eligible" category of player added to the system
custom_steps:
Player Statuses:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

Data Discoveries:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospects+Page
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

AC:
 - There will be a new category of players called "Age - Eligible"
 - Players in this category will be allowed 15 days in a 45-day period
 - Players in this category will be defined by the following:
  -- Player has reached their Eligible to Sign Date
  -- Player has not be registered in ebis (L1 Reg = No)
 - The new category will be reflected on the Prospects Dashbaord and prospect profiles
 - Profile
  -- Months from Signing
 - Dashboard
  -- Months From Signing filters
  -- Months From Signing Column

title: As a AMT User, I want AMT to feature the same matching logic that ebis uses
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user is creating a new player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Next" in create player page
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a duplicate check according to the provided rules. 
AND Club users will only see a match per stories if they have permission to view the matching profile as a match. 
AND Club users are able to see a profile as a match under the following conditions: 
  - The player has been selected for L2 Registration by the BOC.
  - The player has been entered by the viewing Org.
  - The player has been added to the viewing Org's Club Reg List. 
  - The player has passed their Eligible to Sign Date. 
   - The player has been explicitly been made public by the BOC by a flag on their profile. 
  - If none of the above conditions have been met - then the player may appear as a match only under the following conditions: 
        - The player has been registered and their First Review has been set to "Verified" or "Pre-Verified". 
        - The player is Unregistered and does not have a Scouting Status of "International Suspect". 

Business Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/4+of+7+Check

Visibility Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility

title: As an AMT User, I want to see a warning if my Org has already entered a profile I am creating in AMT
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user try to create already existing player in their Org
custom_steps: WHEN user click Next on the create new player page
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a duplicate check against all profiles the Org is able to see in AMT
AND If potential duplicates are found, they will be presented in a modal
AND The modal will match provided Wire and data discovery
AND If the user selects one of the matching profiles, that profile will be loaded in View Mode
AND If the user clicks "No, continue creating prospect," a new profile will be loaded in edit mode

Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/AMT+-+Messages

title: As an AMT User, I want to see a warning if the profile I am entering in AMT already exists in ebis
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user logged in 
AND user try to create already exists player in ebis in AMT
custom_steps: WHEN user click Next on the create new player page
custom_expected:
THEN the system will run a duplicate check against profiles in ebis, in accordance with the logic provided in the matching story
AND Intl Suspect profiles won't be matched against or returned as potential duplicates
AND If potential duplicates are found, they will be presented in a modal
AND The modal will match provided Wire and data discovery
AND If the user selects one of the matching profiles, that profile will be loaded in View Mode
AND If the user clicks "No, continue creating prospect," a new profile will be loaded in edit mode
AND If the profile exists in ebis, user will be able to select the profile, load it, check it in, or save it as Draft.

Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/AMT+-+Messages

title: As an AMT User, I want AMT profiles to be properly mapped to the corresponding ebis profile following a merge
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC or Club user logged in
AND user is merging two player profile
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks merge
custom_expected:
THEN profiles are merged in ebis, all already existing ebis merge rules will be followed
AND When the merge is complete, the new ebisID will be sent to AMT
AND The corresponding AMT profiles will be updated to have the common ebisID

title: As an AMT User, I want add a potential match to my current period prospect list
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Add the title attribute to the icon so on hover a browser tooltip appears saying "Add to current Prospect list"
- If the player is already on the club's prospect list for the current period, the icon will not appear in the matching message
- Clicking the icon will add the prospect to the club's prospect list for the current period
- There will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The screen will refresh and the user will be returned to the Create New dashboard
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- If the player has never been checked in by the club, the player will appear with a status of Draft

title: As an AMT User, I want my current period prospect list to only show prospects that have been added during the current period

https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

- The two periods available are 1/1 to 7/1 and 7/2 to 12/31.

title: As an AMT User, I want adding a prospect from ebis to my current period prospect list to create a profile in AMT
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Add the title attribute to the icon so on hover a browser tooltip appears saying "Add to current Prospect list"
- If the player is already on the club's prospect list for the current period, the icon will not appear in the matching message
- If the player being displayed as a match is an ebis player and does not yet have a profile in AMT for the viewing Club, clicking the icon will automatically create a new Prospect profile and add the prospect to the club's prospect list for the current period
- There will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- The new prospect profile is created for the player and is tied to the proper ebis ID
- The player will appear with a status of Draft

title: Matching Modal Logic Updates
custom_steps:
Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk

AC:
 
Club:
 - The names of potential matches will be a hyperlink if the Club already has a profile for that match
 - If the Club has a profile for the potential match, there will be a check in icon
  -- clicking the check in icon will load the prospect's profile and launch the check in flow
 - If the Club does not have a profile for the potential match, the name will not be a hyperlink
 - If the Club does not have a profile for the potential match, there will be an add player icon
  -- Clicking the add player icon will open the profile in edit mode

BOC:
- If you are logged in as a BOC user, the above AC will use the Org selected on the create new prospect screen

  -- Birth Country

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to submit a new travel authorization form
custom_steps:
Wire
Form: https://zpl.io/adPMAEK
Club Widget: https://zpl.io/2pldoL8
BOC Widget: https://zpl.io/VD4ODMg

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Authorization+Form

AC:
- When the Travel Form is in edit or view mode, Club Users will see a Submit button at the bottom of the form
- The button will appear on unsaved or preliminary Travel Forms
- Clicking Submit will run a required field and formatting check per the data discovery 
- Once the form has passed the required field and formatting checks, if the form was in edit mode, it is reloaded in view mode
- The Form's status will update to Submitted, which will also be reflected on the Club's Travel Forms widget
- The Form will now appear on the BOC's Travel Forms widget, show the status of submitted
- A green success notification will be displayed

title: As an AMT Club User, I want to View the Travel Authorization Forms Widget
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pldoL8

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Travel+Forms+-+Club

AC:
 - When a Club User is viewing the "Travel Forms" dashboard, the club version of the Travel Forms widget will be displayed
 - The widget will match the provided wire and data discovery
 - The widget will be populated with all travel forms the club has created in the past 12 months (they will not see other Clubs' forms)
  -- Anything created more than 12 month ago will roll off and only be available through Advanced Search
 - The widget will default sort descending by Submission Date with all Preliminary Forms appearing at the top of the list
 - There will be a Status filter in the header
 - There will be a type to search filter in the header
 - Clicking on a column header will sort the widget
 - The widget will be exportable to Excel, when it's exported it will retain any applied filters

 - When a BOC User is viewing the "Travel Forms" dashboard, the BOC version of the Travel Forms widget will be displayed

 - The widget will be populated with all travel forms submitted by clubs in the past 12 months
  -- Anything created more than 12 months ago will roll off and only be available through Advanced Search

title: As an AMT User, I want adding a prospect from ebis to my current period prospect list to redirect me to the new profile so I can update some of the information
custom_steps:
Wire:
Soft Match: https://zpl.io/V1w9GRk
Hard Match: https://zpl.io/2ZknENq

Icon:
https://fontawesome.com/icons/user-plus?style=solid

AC:
- When viewing the potential match message, there will be an add to prospect list icon, as depicted in the provided wire
- Clicking the icon for a player that does not yet have a profile for the viewing Club in AMT will redirect the user to a new profile page, with the following fields prepopulated from ebis, and uneditable: 
 - First Name
 - Middle Name
 - Last Name
 - Extended Last Name
 - Birth Date
 - Birth Country
 - Birth State
 - Birth City
 - Country of Reisdence
 - EBIS ID
 - National ID Country
 - Number (Cedula)  
- The position fields, and Trainer information fields will be editable
- IF the ebis profile has trainer information that has been entered by the creating Org, then it is pre-populated but remains editable. If the trainer information is for any other Org, it will not display in AMT. 
- When the user saves the profile, there will be a success message ("Prospect added to current prospects list")
- The screen will refresh and the user will be returned to the Create New dashboard
- The player will appear for the club on their prospects dashboard
- The player will appear with a status of Draft

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit an approved Travel Authorization Form
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a BOC user is viewing a submitted travel authorization form there will be an Edit button
 - Clicking the Edit button will reload the full form in edit mode
 - When the form is in edit mode, there will be a Save and Cancel button
 - Clicking Save should commit the changes and reload the form in view mode
 - Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their decision
 - There will also be a Reject button in edit mode.
  -- Clicking this button will reject the form back to the Club, allowing them to make any changes to previously submitted information
  -- The club will then be able to resubmit, if they choose

-- There will also be a Reject button in View mode of approved forms

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit a submitted Travel Authorization Form
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a BOC user is viewing a submitted travel authorization form there will be an Edit button
 - Clicking the Edit button will reload the form in edit mode
 - When the form is in edit mode, there will be a Save and Cancel button
 - Clicking Save should commit the changes and reload the form in view mode
 - Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their decision
 - The Approve and Reject buttons will also be available in Edit mode

title: As an AMT BOC User, I want to review a club's Checkins This Period from the Clubs Dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
Club-Desktop: https://zpl.io/bz1gZeX 
Modal: https://zpl.io/adPeJ5l
Mobile Modal: https://zpl.io/2EPqQme 

AC:
 - On the Clubs Dashboard, "Check Ins This Period" will be a hyperlink
 - Clicking on this link will open a modal
 - The modal will display high level information for each prospect that Club has checked in during the current period
 - The modal will match the prospect wire
 - Clicking a prospect's name will load the prospect's profile
 - Clicking the Close button or the 'X' icon will dismiss the modal

title: As a BOC AMT User, I want to Check In a Player On Behalf of a Club
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/2pn8OqM

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
  - BOC Users will see a Check In button on prospect profiles with a status of "Draft" or "Checked Out"
  - Clicking the Check In button will open the Location tab of the Check In modal
  - The BOC's version of this screen will have a "Checking In On Behalf Of:"  dropdown
  - This dropdown will only be populated with with Orgs that have a profile for the player in AMT
  - There will be a Next button and a Cancel button
  - Clicking Cancel will return the user to the prospect's profile
  - Clicking the Next button will take the User to the Location tab of the Check In modal

title: As an AMT User, I want to Check Out a Player from his profile
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/bWgMLB7

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

AC:
 - When a prospect is checked in, he will have a "Check Out" button on his profile, as depicted by the wire (different icon than check in)
 - Clicking the Check Out button will open a modal prompting the user to confirm they wish to check out the player
 - The modal will match the provided wire
  -- If the user declines, the modal will close and the user will be returned to the profile
  -- If the user accepts, the player will be checked out
 - A green "Checked Out" confirmation will be displayed on the player's profile
 - The Prospect's status on his profile will be updated to Checked-Out
 - His Check-In History widget on his profile will update to show his Check Out Date
 - The Check Out button on his profile will switch back to a Check In button
 - The prospect will no longer appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard

title: As an AMT User, I want to complete the Check In process for a player
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - There will be an active Check In button on the Confirmation tab
 - Clicking the Check In button will check in the player
 - The user will return the prospect's profile and a green "Checked In" confirmation will be displayed, as depicted
 - The Prospect's status on his profile will be updated to Check-In
 - There will be a new entry on his Check-In History widget on his profile
 - The Check In button will update to a Check Out button on his profile, as depicted
 - The prospect will appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard
 - The Photo on the prospect's profile will update to show the most recent check in photo

title: As an AMT User, I want to Check Out a Player from the Prospect Dashboard
custom_steps:
Wire:
Prospect Dashboard: https://zpl.io/VqlqJeG
Checkout: https://zpl.io/bWgMLB7

Data Discovery:
 - When a prospect is checked in, he will have a checkbox next to his name on the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - When the check box is checked, the "Check Out" button will become active
 - Multiple players may be selected at one time
 - Each row that's selected should have active row styling
 - Clicking the Check Out button will open a modal prompting the user to confirm they wish to check out the player:
  **Body** "Are you sure you want to check out X prospect(s)?"
  **Buttons:** Check out prospect(s), Back
  -- If the user clicks Back, the modal will close and the user will be returned to the prospect dashboard
  -- If the user clicks Check Out Prospect(s), the player(s) will be checked out
 - A green "Checked Out" confirmation will be displayed on the  prospect dashboard
 - The Prospects' status on their profiles will be updated to Checked-Out
 - His Check-In History widgets on the profiles will update to show the Check Out Dates
 - The Check Out button on their profiles will switch back to a Check In button
 - The prospect will no longer appear under the Checked In filter on the prospects dashboard
 - The Checked In Tally will update on the BOC's Club Dashboard

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate and display how many days a player is allowed to be checked-in during the current period
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - The system will calculate how many days a prospect is allowed to be checked-in during the current check-in period
 - This total will be based off the prospect's month's to signing date
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - This number will appear as the denominator of the Days Used fields
 - This number will be static for the length of the check-in period

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate how many days a player has been checked-in during the current period
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - They system will count days a prospect is checked-in
 - Both the check-in and check-out days will count
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted

title: As an AMT User, I want the system to calculate and display a prospect's Next Check-in Date
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/brEqZvr
https://zpl.io/29ygDKW

AC:
 - The system will calculate the next date the prospect will be allowed to be checked in
 - The Prospect's total will be displayed on his profile and the Prospect Dashboard, as depicted
 - If the player has days remaining, this field will be blank
  -- Example: If a prospect has only used 12 of his 15 allotted days, he is allowed to be checked in now.  Rather than display today's date, this field will be blank
 - If the player is out of days, the field will display the date he becomes eligible to be checked-in
  -- Example: If a player has used all 15 of his 15 allotted days, the date he begins gaining days back will be displayed
 - If the start of the next check in period is before the calculated Next Check In Date, display the start of the next Check In period

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are 12-18 Months from Signing to only be allowed 7 Days per period
custom_steps:
Rules:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Examples

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is 12 - 18 Months from Signing, they may only be checked in for 7 days
 - 7 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 7 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are 6-12 Months from Signing to only be allowed 15 Days in any 90 Day period
custom_steps:
Rules:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Examples

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is 6 - 12 Months from Signing, they may only be checked in for 15 days in any 90 day period
 - 15 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 15 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out
 - After 90 days, the prospect will begin "gaining" more permissible days

 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

AC:
 - If a prospect is 0 - 6 Months from Signing, they may only be checked in for 15 days in any 45 day period
 - 15 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 15 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out
 - After 45 days, the prospect will begin "gaining" more permissible days

title: As an AMT User, I want prospects who are Eligible to Sign to only be allowed 45 Days in any 90 Day period
custom_steps:
Rules:
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities
 - https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Examples

Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:

AC:
 - If a prospect is Eligible to Sign, they may only be checked in for 45 days in any 90 day period
 - 45 will appear as the denominator of Days Used for these prospects
 - If the prospect is not checked out by the end of the 45 days, he will continue accumulating days until he is checked out
 - After 90 days, the prospect will begin "gaining" more permissible days

title: As a Club AMT User, I want to be prevented from checking in a player that who doesn't have any days left
custom_steps:
Wire:
https://zpl.io/V0JDDwl

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Statuses

AC:
 - If a prospect is Overdue for a Club, that Club will not be able to check in that prospect
 - Clicking the Check In button will display a blocking message:
**Title:** Unable to Check In Prospect
**Body:** Prospect is Overdue and may not be checked in until [**Next Sign In Date**].  Please contact BOC with any questions.
**Buttons:** OK
 - Clicking Back will dismiss the message

title: As an AMT User, I want check in period data cleared out when a new Check In Period begins
custom_steps:
AC:
 - When a new Check In Period begins (January 1st or July 2nd), all days used counts should be reset
 - Allowable days should be recalculated based on players' Months from Signing
 - The prospect dashboard should be cleared of players
  -- Checked In Players should remain on the dashboard
  -- DRAFT players should remain on the dashboard
 - Check In Histories for players should be untouched
 - Checked In Players should remain checked in
  -- The first day of the period will count towards their days used for the new period

title: As an AMT User, I want to be prevented from checking in a player that can't be checked in
custom_steps:
Rules:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Eligibility+to+Enter+Club+Facilities

Wire:
https://zpl.io/2ZjvMO1

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Check+In

AC:
 - If a prospect is more than 18 Months from signing, when the user clicks the "Check In" button, they system will return a blocking message:
**Title:** This Player Does Not Meet Age Requirements!
**Body:** [Check box] Check the box if you have received approval from BOC to check in this specific prospect.
**Hint:**  BOC will be notified upon check in.
**Buttons:** Check In, Cancel
 - Clicking the Cancel button will dismiss the message
 - The Check In button will be disabled until the check box is checked
  -- If the check box is checked, the Check In button will be enabled and blue, if clicked the user will be taken to the Check In prospect modal


*BOC Notification to be handled in a later story*

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit a prospect's check in history
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

Wire:
https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA

AC:
 - When the edit button on a prospect's profile is clicked, the Check In History widget will become editable when the form enters edit mode
 - Only BOC Users will see this widget as editable
 - The editable fields will match the provided data discovery
 - The Save and Cancel buttons on the form will cover edits to the widget

title: As a BOC User, I want to edit a prospect's check in photos
custom_steps:
Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Prospect+Profile

Wire:
https://zpl.io/bPPk5GA

AC:
 - When the edit button on a prospect's profile is clicked, the Check In History widget will become editable when the form enters edit mode
 - Only BOC Users will see this widget as editable
 - There will be an upload icon next to the check in photo
 - Clicking the upload icon will launch a file browser that will allow the user to select a new photo
 - Changing the most recent check in photo will update the profile photo
 - The Save and Cancel buttons on the form will cover edits to the widget

title: AMT Permission Roles
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with the following permissions: 
amt-user
amt-boc-admin
amt-club-admin
custom_steps: WHEN the user attempts to login
custom_expected:
THEN the user should be able to login into the AMT system 
AND the developer tools can be inspected for the correct role.

title: AMT Profile Permissions
custom_steps:
- Club Users are able to search and load prospect profiles that they have entered
  -- This includes new profiles or matching profiles they have selected
 - When a club is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will not see other clubs' check in information
 - When a club is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will not see other clubs' Travel Authorization information


 - BOC Users are able to search and load all player profiles within AMT
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive check in history that covers check ins by all clubs
 - When a BOC User is viewing the profile of a player that has been checked in by other clubs, they will see a comprehensive Travel Authorization history that covers forms created by all clubs
